    Pondering upon Eigenvectors

    12 minute read

    Published: June 17, 2020

    The Eigenvectors & Eigenvalues pop up in many places of mathematical analysis and application. For example: Machine Learning, Control Theory, Signal Processing, Quantum Physics, Markov Process just to name a few! Despite itâ€™s wide applications, it isnâ€™t entirely clear as to what do these Eigenvectors represent and what is their significance in all these applications. Also, many students see Eigenvectors as a bunch of steps to find a vector which is going to help them, and hence they have very little intuition about them. In this post, I plan to give an intuition of the same and also provide some insights of how it is calculated algorithmically.
